effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 879,371 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 344,804.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

sockets.display_string: +136 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

description: For all your radiation dampening needs.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,934 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 209 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.
